mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id AS orderID, o.user_no AS userNo, o.product_id AS productId, o.orderstatus_id AS orderstatusId, o.order_totalprice AS orderTotalprice, o.order_date AS orderDate, p.filepath1 AS filepath, p.product_name AS productName, s2.shippingstatus_name AS status FROM `order` o JOIN shipping s ON o.order_id = s.order_id JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id JOIN shippingstatus s2 ON s.shippingstatus_id = s2.shippingstatus_id WHERE o.user_no = #{userNo} AND s.shippingstatus_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY o.order_id DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT o.order_id AS orderID, o.user_no AS userNo, o.product_id AS productId, o.orderstatus_id AS orderstatusId, o.order_totalprice AS orderTotalprice, o.order_date AS orderDate, p.filepath1 AS filepath, p.product_name AS productName, s2.shippingstatus_name AS status FROM `order` o JOIN shipping s ON o.order_id = s.order_id JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id JOIN shippingstatus s2 ON s.shippingstatus_id = s2.shippingstatus_id WHERE o.user_no = #{userNo} AND s.shippingstatus_id = 3 ORDER BY o.order_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(order_id), 0) + 1 AS orderId FROM `order` ORDER BY order_id DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (order_id, user_no, product_id, orderstatus_id, order_totalprice, order_refund, order_card) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{userNo},#{productId},#{orderstatusId},#{orderTotalprice},#{orderRefund},#{orderCard})
